question: Question_05_(c)
statement:
Let

$\displaystyle W = \text{span}\left\{ 
\begin{bmatrix} 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{bmatrix},
\begin{bmatrix} 0 \\ 1 \\ 4 \\ -1 \end{bmatrix},
\begin{bmatrix} 2 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ 3 \end{bmatrix},
\begin{bmatrix} 4 \\ -1 \\ 8 \\ 2 \end{bmatrix}
\right\}$Find all \emph{c} such that $\displaystyle [c,1,1,0]^{T}$ lies in
\emph{W}.
